greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of a nested radical: sqrt(1! + sqrt(2! + sqrt(3! + ...
link: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Popular Computing (Calabasas, CA), The CSR Function, Vol. 4 (No. 34, Jan 1976), pages PC34-10 to PC34-11. Annotated and scanned copy.
program: (PARI) t=0:forstep(n=300,1,-1,t=sqrt(t+n!)):print(t) gives more than enough correct digits for the number given here.
results.author: Mark Hudson (mrmarkhudson(AT)hotmail.com), Nov 02 2004
